item.title: Seemingly endless grids and performance
item.description: I've been dealing with performance in Grid Framework recently and added a feature that will keep the Garbage Collector from going crazy. Until now rendering always went like this: Manager requests rendering from grid -> grid calculates the end points of each line -> these points get passed to Unity's GL class …
item.dc:creator: HiPhish

item.title: How to extend Grid Framework with your own methods
item.description: Let's say you just bought Grid Framework, wrote some game logic and now you want to reuse it. Wouldn't it be great if it was a class method in Grid Framework so you could simply call it with one line of code? Even better, what if you could have one …
item.dc:creator: HiPhish
